title: Large-Scale Teaching-Learning Support Strategy Design for Future University Libraries

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using personal devices, with integrated utilization of the library's digital resources.

learning_goals: Learners can apply the ADDIE model to design improvements for library services supporting mathematical learning.
Learners can complete a project-based learning (PBL) math problem-solving project using digital learning resources.
Learners can evaluate new role models for libraries in the teaching-learning process.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
